titleStmt.title: The humble remonstrances of the Commission of the Generall Assemblie, to the Kings Majestie, and Honorable Comittee of Estates, of the third, and twenty fyfth of January, 1651 with the answer from the Kings Majesty & Honorable Comittee of Estates, thereunto, of the sixth of Februarie, 1651.
titleStmt.author: Church of Scotland. General Assembly. Commission.
